title: Mrs. Smith's kitchen 史密斯太太的厨房
introduction: Listen to the tape then answer this question. What colour is the electric cooker?
听录音，然后回答问题。电灶是什么颜色的?

text_and_translation.translation: 史密斯夫人的厨房很小。

text_and_translation.text: There is a refrigerator in the kitchen.
The refrigerator is white. It is on the right.
text_and_translation.translation: 冰箱是白色的。它位于房间右侧。

text_and_translation.text: There is an electric cooker in the kitchen.
The cooker is blue. It is on the left.
text_and_translation.translation: 电灶是蓝色的。它位于房间左侧。

text_and_translation.text: There is a table in the middle of the room.
There is a bottle on the table.
There is a cup on the table, too. The cup is clean.
text_and_translation.translation: 桌子上还有一只杯子。杯子很干净。

notes.title: There is / There are
notes.describe: 用于表达某地存在某物，单数用'There is'，复数用'There are'。

notes.title: on the right / on the left
notes.describe: 表示物品相对于说话人或另一个参照物的方位。

notes.title: in the middle of
notes.describe: 表示某物位于某个区域的中央位置。
